data.name: HellFish Arsonist Kit
data.detailed_description: HellFish Arsonist Kit - ignite your holidays with this special fireworks kit that features a set of 24 colorful power-blast rockets that sparkle, whizz, whrils and pow at even the smallest contact with fire. Impress your friends and everyone luck enough to be around you when you let this holiday explosion pack go off into the night sky!
data.about_the_game: HellFish Arsonist Kit - ignite your holidays with this special fireworks kit that features a set of 24 colorful power-blast rockets that sparkle, whizz, whrils and pow at even the smallest contact with fire. Impress your friends and everyone luck enough to be around you when you let this holiday explosion pack go off into the night sky!
data.short_description: HellFish Arsonist Kit - ignite your holidays with this special fireworks kit that features a set of 24 colorful power-blast rockets that sparkle, whizz, whrils and pow at even the smallest contact with fire. Impress your friends and everyone luck enough to be around you when you let this holiday explosion pack go off into the night sky!
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
